quest.title: Start of an adventure
quest.dialog: The captain wakes you up. "Hey hitchhiker! This is your stop."
You are at the area where you saw the meteorite hit. It had a weird signature. If you EXPLORE the area you might score big time!
You find the meteorite resting on the ground. No crater. A shiny dodecahedron that is surprisingly light when you load it into the rover. The TRADE guild will pay a fortune for this.
"Nice doing business with ya kid! Say, with that money you can buy a starship. I have a nice hull standing here. What do you say?"
There it is. An opportunity to finally leave this rock. You accept eagerly.
"Now you can LIFT OFF and leave this planet. But it is dangerous out there, go by Samson and get some weapons for that ship."
"My friend at Backwater said you would be coming. We have a nice Photon Ray in stock left. You are welcome to LAND and TRADE with us here at Samson's Folly."
You now have a Photon Ray, a basic weapon. Tap you ship hologram to open your PROFILE and INSTALL your new Photon Ray

quest.title: Shady spacer
quest.dialog: A sad rusty ship radios you. "Fellow spacer! There is nice loot on this moon but my landing gear is bust. If you LAND and help me EXPLORE I'll reward you."
The eager spacer thank you several times for helping her finding the boxes. You receive a small reward and you hope you don't see the her again.

quest.title: Peril at Bouy 72
quest.dialog: You receive a transmission: "Help us. The way ahead is blocked by a malfunctioning drone. We don't dare to proceed. You have to clear the path for us!"
That drone wasn't even armed. This adventure looks like its going to be a walk in the park.

quest.title: Bal Gru's stolen subsystems
quest.dialog: Hey girl, I'm Bal Gru, merchant in distress. Can you help me? Bandits robbed me of all of my subsystems. Can you get them back for me?
You have our stolen subsystems! This is invaluable to us. Here, take this artifact, it is the least we can give you.
The Larato Gate looks like a torus shaped lump of stone needles. The Blue Signature in your inventory is humming. Should you approach?
The gate's mass of needles swells and twitches. The hole in the torus shimmers and turns into a misty black cloud.
The misty dark cloud in the toroidal gate swirls.

quest.title: Blue seeds
quest.dialog: These Blue Seeds might take root in the right soil.
You plant the Blue Seeds on a lonely island.
You gather the Blue Flowers that sprung out of the planted seeds.

quest.title: Helyon Shipyards
quest.dialog: If you bring 1000 credits and no cops I can land you a fine Battleship hull. No receipt. Ok?
1000 credits and you have yourself a fine Battleship. If you give me you old hull.

quest.title: The Tale of Alkalurops
quest.dialog: An old drunken kosmonaut tells you a tale of the planet Alkalurops.
You have found the mysterious planet of Alkarulops.
You explore Alkalurops and find unmentionable horrors. Your mind breaks.

quest.title: Thanatos relic 1
quest.dialog: You found a relic, a machine part covered with cuneiform markings.

quest.dialog: You found a relic, a machine part covered with cuneiform markings.

quest.title: Rebuild the Thanatos
quest.dialog: It is the Thanatos derelict. Immensely old. Broken. The intact half is covered in cuneiform markings.
You now possess all three missing pieces of the Thanatos.
The relics would restore the form of Thanatos.
As the parts touch the derelict the edges melts and merge. In an instant the dead ship springs to life, fire dancing across its hull as it burns away the dust covering it.
The radio warbles as you are flooded with signals. A single grey sphere emerge from the the ship and drifts toward you.

quest.title: Ska Ska water quality
quest.dialog: "Can you help us? We run a large construction project at Ska Ska and need to take water samples at its sea"
"Thank you! These samples are vital for the project. Please, accept this compensation"
